rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3445, 3892, M20021}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {EPP2011}

description: This unit continues to develop the role of the paramedic as a clinician by extending clinical examination and decision making skills that were introduced in previous clinical units.The unit addresses injury and injury prevention across the lifespan, with specific reference to commonly encountered acute and chronic musculoskeletal conditions, injury.The unit will be case based, and will include clinical skills laboratories and simulation to develop essential clinical skills, clinical problem solving and decision making competencies. The scope of the unit includes developing the skills needed to provide general health care as well as care at an advanced life support level.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
